name: GLADIATOR BEAST META
author: beliethat
notes: I was determined to get KoG this month with gladiator beasts.  I started this season from Plat 1 and climbed  from Plat 1 to Legend 1 with this same decklist using the skill Mind Scan.  In Legend, I could not get a consistent win streak going as players seemed to expect mind scan gladiators.  I switched the skill to Parasite Infestation and was able to make it to KoG.  Players were not expecting gladiator beasts from Weevil and the burn damage from parasite paracide won a few games on the final climb from Legend 3 to Kog
